The origin of the military finance in the Han Dynasty can trace back to the Zhou Dynasty, and it consummated in the Qin Dynasty.

sentences.english: Qin aggrandizement was aided by frequent military expeditions pushing forward the frontiers in the north and south.

sentences.english: Rulers of the Qin Dynasty consciously combined the eastern six states cultures for two times.

sentences.english: Prof Qin stops short of saying that China should accept full membership of the Mekong Commission.
sentences.chinese: 秦教授并没有认为中国应当完全加入湄公河委员会。

sentences.english: Qin routinely treats foreign media as lacking in the standards that he ascribes to the Chinese media.
sentences.chinese: 秦认为外媒缺乏他认为如中国媒体一般的准则。
